View Seed WordsÔÉÅ

Access your seed words for backup verification or recovery purposes.

Complete Step-by-Step Process with All ScreenshotsÔÉÅ

  1. Navigate: Home ‚Üí Seeds ‚Üí [Select Seed] ‚Üí Backup Seed ‚Üí View Seed Words

  1. Acknowledge Security Warning: Press ‚ÄúI Understand‚Äù for the classified information warning

  1. Review All Words: View your complete seed phrase (displayed 4 words at a time)

  1. Optional Verification: Complete backup verification process by selecting verify or else select skip to proceed

  1. Exit Securely: Ensure you‚Äôre in a private location before viewing

üîê Critical Security Warning: Only view seed words in a completely private, secure location away from cameras, other people, and any recording devices. Consider covering the screen from different angles.
